snippet: From century-old black-and-white prints to manipulated digital color images, photographs have taken over Grand Palais. If it's November, it must be time for Paris Photo.
abstract: From century-old black-and-white prints to manipulated digital color images, photographs have taken over Grand Palais. If it's November, it must be time for Paris Photo.

headline.main: At Paris Photo, What David Lynch Likes and an Archive of Conflict
